nodes.text: Anoat City was a city on the planet of Anoat. It was the planet's only settlement.

By the time of the Galactic Civil War, the city itself had long been vacated. Directly underneath the abandoned city was a massive abandoned sewage complex, consisting of rusting sludge-soaked durasteel girder tunnels and passageways that made up the subterranean sewer system. The difficult to navigate, endless sewers were patrolled by dianogas.

Kyle Katarn ventured into the sewage complex underneath the city in order to locate the weapons designer Moff Rebus. The Moff engineered an elaborate series of drain switches to serve as a security system, allowing him to hide out in the sewers.
